name: KOKO THE KREEP
description: This special piece was created early in 2020 and is heavily inspired by the iconic dancing animation of "Koko the Clown" by Fleischer Studios. The WALNUT STREET parody depicts a KREEP dancing in Koko's style but in a different setting. Portraits of TOMORROWMAN and UNCLE MASON can be found in the background on the wall. "KOKO THE KREEP" was traditionally hand-drawn and later color and other background elements were done in Photoshop. This is a TOMORROWMAN original artwork.
